text: 7.31 Jon 2.23, 8.30, 10.42, 11.45, 12.11, 12.42 Pen binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl kɨli agɨlak, Bɨ anɨb awl ne tap mageptek kuŋay gup agɨlak. Pen ne Bɨ God nop aglup ak, chɨn tay agɨnɨgun agɨlak. Bɨ God nop aglup ak ne kɨdek ownɨgab ñɨn ak, bɨ anɨb awl ne gup tek ma gɨnɨgab agɨlak. Anɨb ak binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl kɨli Jisas ne ke Bɨ God nop aglup ak agɨl, nop gos lɨnɨgɨlak.
